snippet: The judge, Col. James Pohl, has ordered the government to show him confidential correspondence about prison conditions at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, a defense lawyer said Wednesday.
abstract: Col James Pohl, judge presiding over military commission's prosecution of five people accused in the Sept 11 terrorist attacks, orders government to show him confidential correspondence with International Committee of the Red Cross about prison conditions at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
lead_paragraph: The judge, Col. James Pohl, has ordered the government to show him confidential correspondence about prison conditions at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, a defense lawyer said Wednesday.

headline.main: Judge in Terrorism Case Orders Look at Secret Records
headline.print_headline: Judge In Terrorism Case Orders Look at Secret Records

keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
keywords.name: organizations
